content: **crocheted bag in drops big delight the piece is worked bottom up with star pattern on the bottom ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no db-112 yarn group c or a + a ------------------------------------------------------- **size** measurements diameter of bottom approx 26 cm circumference approx 82 cm height without straps approx 40 cm straps approx 40 cm **materials** drops big delight from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 200 g colour 07 sunrise **crochet gauge ** 18 treble crochets in width and 10½ row in height = 10 x 10 cm crochet hook drops crochet hook size 3 5 mm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
